title: No private buses tomorrow: Gemunu
body_lines: The Lanka Private Bus Owners' Association (LPBOA) today said they have decided to refrain from service from tonight.
Addressing the media, LPBOA chairman, Gemunu Wijerathne requested all bus owners to cancel all ticket bookings for tomorrow and to stop running
He said the decision was taken due to the current diesel shortage and in solidarity with the nationwide hartal tomorrow. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
